sys_ux_macroponent.name: Request Menu
sys_ux_macroponent.props: [ { "defaultValue": "request", "description": "Key of the active menu item", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Active key", "name": "activeKey", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": true, "description": "Navigate to target URL when clicking menu", "fieldType": "boolean", "label": "Navigate on click", "name": "navigateOnClick", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "request", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 1 key", "name": "item1Key", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "ข้อมูลคำขอ", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 1 label", "name": "item1Label", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "request", "description": "request | docs", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 1 icon", "name": "item1Icon", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 1 URL", "name": "item1Url", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "same", "description": "same | new", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 1 target", "name": "item1Target", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "docs", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 2 key", "name": "item2Key", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "เอกสารประกอบการพิจารณา", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 2 label", "name": "item2Label", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "docs", "description": "request | docs", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 2 icon", "name": "item2Icon", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 2 URL", "name": "item2Url", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "same", "description": "same | new", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Item 2 target", "name": "item2Target", "valueType": "string" } ]
